label: A5B3_mP32_13_ef4g_ab2g-001
title: Room Temperature V$_{3}$O$_{5}$ Structure
comments:
This is the ground state structure of V$_{3}$O$_{5}$.  In the range 423-433K it transforms into \href{current_web_home_dir/A5B3_mC32_15_e2f_af-003}{oxyvanite}, which is metastable at room temperature (Armbruster, 2009).  V$_{3}$O$_{5}$ can also be found in the metastable form of anosovite, which has the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B5C_oC32_63_f_c2f_c-001}{Fe$_{2}$TiO$_{5}$ ($E4_{1}$) structure} (Weber, 2012). 
 ({\AA}sbrink, 1980) places the first two types of vanadium atoms on the (2c) and (2d) Wyckoff positions of space group $P2/c$ \#13.  We shifted the origin so that these atoms are on the (2a) and (2b) sites.
